pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: (col) perjalanan pulang pergi, pergi dan pulang, tiket pulang

lessons.japanese: 現在、通常のサービスの早急な復旧に努めています。
lessons.indonesian: We are currently working to restore normal service as soon as possible.

lessons.japanese: パスワードを復旧するため、確認用の質問にお答えください。
lessons.indonesian: Answer the following question to receive your password.

lessons.japanese: パスワードを復旧するため、確認用の質問にお答えください。
lessons.indonesian: Answer the following question to receive your password.

lessons.japanese: システム障害の復旧作業は、徹夜作業となりました。
lessons.indonesian: The work that needed to be done to repair the system damage continued all throughout the night.
